custom_policies: Casing must be camelCase for all frontend-bound parameters (e.g., 'userId', not 'user_id' or 'UserID').
Security tokens MUST NOT be stored in local storage; use HttpOnly cookies.
All database query functions must include transaction management.
Function parameters must not exceed 5 arguments without explicit written justification in the PR description.
Avoid deeply nested if/else statements (Cyclomatic Complexity > 10) by favoring early returns (guard clauses).
